message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay up to $100 for the product. Let me know if this is possible.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $100 is below my minimum price, I'm willing to compromise. I can offer the product for $105. This is still a good deal for both of us. Let me know if you're interested.
